mapper.select: select m_id AS mid, m_pw AS mpw, m_name AS mname, m_check AS mcheck, auth_id AS aid, hq_id AS hqid, dept_id AS did, team_id AS tid from tbl_member where m_id=#{mid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_comment (c_content, c_regdate, c_moddate, p_id, m_id, c_check) VALUES (#{comment.ccontent}, #{comment.cregdate}, #{comment.cmoddate}, #{comment.pid}, #{comment.mid}, #{comment.ccheck})
